title: NF: git-show frontend to replace a bunch of other helpers ￼…

labels.name: on hold - input required
labels.description: Work on this issue cannot proceed until critical feedback was given

body:
...that are GitPython-based, like:

- `get_commit_date()`
- `get_files()`
- `get_file_content()`

There are no tests yet. Please comment on whether you would like to see such RF being done in core. If that is the case, I'll do the tests with the tooling in -core.

Demos:
